section.title: Base
section.para: The procedures listed in may return the following errors:

note.title: ***Design Note***
note.para: Itemize according to the relevant task relating to the parent concept - Base User Interface Components. Perhaps chunk this down into individual sections depending on the extent of the content - for Context Sensitive Help.

listitem.para: An attempt was made to do things incorrectly which resulted in the error.
Perform this action to rectify the error.
